metadata.synopsis:
Kithrak Voss, the knight hunting Lae'zel, rides in on a dragon and kills flaming fist on a bridge. Lae'zel approaches, thinking he might lead her to a creche, where she can bec ured of the tadpole.

SVoss is spoiled, intelligent, and creepily calm and fatherly: Joaquin Phoenix in Gladiator. Smarmy and evil sounding. Pronunciation: Qudenos = cue-DAY-noss. Ghaik = GAYK. Kith'rak = KITH-rack. Lae'zel = lay-ZELL. Vlaakith = VLAH-kith.

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.text: Rider - my time is short. Lead me to...
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel begins to bow as she speaks to the kith'rak

88.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

101.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
101.text: Were I not merciful, I would slice the skin clean from your meat.
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

32.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
32.text: Yet you are not bleeding. For I am nothing if not merciful.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

109.speaker: Lae'zel
109.text: Voss, Knight Supreme. The queen's silver, the queen's sword.
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Pause after the line. Camera shows Lae'zel for a second or so. She is still bowed, silent, frowning.|

118.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Pause after the line. Camera shows Lae'zel for a second or so. She is still bowed, silent, frowning.|

45.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
45.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky, Lae'zel. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Pause after the line. Camera shows Lae'zel for a second or so. She is still bowed, silent, frowning.|

130.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
130.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Pause after the line. Camera shows Lae'zel for a second or so. She is still bowed, silent, frowning.|

80.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
80.text: Speak up, child. Affirm your mandate.
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Snotty and confident,

86.speaker: Lae'zel
86.text: My mandate, Jhe'stil Kith'rak, is to locate this crèche. I was infected aboard a ghaik ship and need to be purified. Your mandate is to aid me.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rakNodeContext: Snotty and confident,

2.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
2.text: Purified? Oh, Lae'zel - why must the truth be so bitter? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

122.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
122.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

134.text: You will give us the weapon. Then you will bend your head for the sword.

136.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
136.text: You will give us the weapon. Then you will bend your head for the sword.

47.speaker: Lae'zel
47.text: Stand down, knight. I do not have what you seek!

140.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
140.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and the tadpole crushed. Then examine her corpse. I will take word to the Undying Queen.

79.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
79.context: NodeContext: Smarmy and evil sounding. Tears = the tears you cry

96.speaker: Narrator
96.text: *You know of this man. He is Voss, Knight Supreme, a legendary warrior revered among the githyanki people.*
96.context: NodeContext: Tears, as in tears that come from your eyes. A reference to the Tears of Selune, the asteroid belt in which creche k'liir is located.

9.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
9.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky, Lae'zel. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.
9.context: NodeContext: Tears, as in tears that come from your eyes. A reference to the Tears of Selune, the asteroid belt in which creche k'liir is located.

4.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
4.text: It is polyhedric in shape, and inscribed with the sacred runes of our people.
4.context: NodeContext: Tears, as in tears that come from your eyes. A reference to the Tears of Selune, the asteroid belt in which creche k'liir is located.

108.speaker: Lae'zel
108.text: Kith'rak, I seek purification. I have been infected aboard a ghaik vessel.
108.context: NodeContext: Tears, as in tears that come from your eyes. A reference to the Tears of Selune, the asteroid belt in which creche k'liir is located.

123.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
123.text: Purification? Oh, Lae'zel - why must the truth be so bitter? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

49.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
49.text: Purification? Why must the truth be so bitter, young one? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

112.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
112.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

23.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
23.text: Baretha - see that her skull is split and the tadpole crushed, on Vlaakith's command.

104.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
104.text: The search continues. I will take word to the Undying Queen.

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

99.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
99.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

72.speaker: Narrator
72.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

10.speaker: Lae'zel
10.text: I do not hail from this land, but from Crèche K'liir.
10.context: NodeContext: Tears, as in tears that come from your eyes. A reference to the Tears of Selune, the asteroid belt in which creche k'liir is located.

135.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
135.text: Crèche K'liir? You are far from the Tears, Lae'zel. Does the caretaker let you stray so far?
135.context: NodeContext: Tears, as in tears that come from your eyes. A reference to the Tears of Selune, the asteroid belt in which creche k'liir is located.

95.speaker: Lae'zel
95.text: I've come to fulfil my final test: collecting a mind flayer's head.

113.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
113.text: Then your test is delayed - your queen issues a new command.

29.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
29.text: Then your test is delayed - your queen issues a new command.

115.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
115.text: I fly now to Vlaakith, our Undying Queen. She will see your faith rewarded in this plane and ours.

126.speaker: Lae'zel
126.text: Kith'rak, I seek purification. I have been infected aboard a ghaik vessel.

75.text: Kith'rak, I seek purification. I have been infected aboard a ghaik vessel.

144.speaker: Lae'zel
144.text: Kith'rak, I seek purification. I have been infected aboard a ghaik vessel.

71.text: You test my temper, young one. Now tell me your purpose, while you can still breathe.

11.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
11.text: You test my temper, young one. Now tell me your purpose, while you can still breathe.

94.speaker: Lae'zel
94.text: My crèche has asked me to learn of local customs.

93.text: Then your mission is delayed - your queen issues a new command.

76.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
76.text: Then your mission is delayed - your queen issues a new command.

103.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
103.text: Crèche K'liir? You are far from the Tears. Does your caretaker let you stray so far?

41.speaker: Lae'zel
41.text: I will deliver the message as you command.

33.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
33.text: You serve your Queen well, child. Take your slaves, and hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. They must carry the weapon.

6.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
6.text: You serve your Queen well, child. Take your slaves, and hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. They must carry the weapon.

20.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
20.text: I fly now to Vlaakith, our Undying Queen. She will see your faith rewarded in this plane and ours.

61.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
61.text: You serve your queen well, child. Hunt those who escaped the ghaik ship. Find the weapon.

68.text: Sweet child. Your lies sting. Has Vlaakith not demanded better?

57.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
57.text: Sweet child. Your lies sting. Has Vlaakith not demanded better?

42.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
42.text: The truth, Lae'zel, before you stretch my mercies thin.

119.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
119.text: The truth, before you stretch my mercies thin.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: Produce the odd artefact. You're looking for this, I take it?

28.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
28.text: Our thief comes forth, Baretha. Did you imagine such fortune?

92.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
92.text: See that her skull is split and her corpse fully examined. I will take word to the Undying Queen.

102.speaker: Lae'zel
102.text: Enough. I've been infected aboard a ghaik vessel and require purification.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: The knight moves his hands - detect thoughts animations

131.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
131.text: Purification? Oh, child - why must the truth be so bitter? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

52.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
52.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: The knight moves his hands - detect thoughts animations

100.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
100.text: Your silence is a dagger in Vlaakith's heart.
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: The knight moves his hands - detect thoughts animations

138.speaker: Narrator
138.text: *He moves his hand in a quick flurry of gestures.*
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: The knight moves his hands - detect thoughts animations

40.speaker: Lae'zel
40.text: Quickly read the meaning of his gestures.

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *You realise he is casting Detect Thoughts.*

65.speaker: Narrator
65.text: *You realise he is casting Detect Thoughts.*

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: Allow him access to your mind.

142.speaker: Lae'zel
142.text: Will yourself to resist his probing.

59.text: You close yourself to me, child? Such delightful hubris. The nation is stronger for it.

21.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
21.text: You close yourself to me, child? Such delightful hubris. The nation is stronger for it.

124.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
124.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.

1.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
1.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.

60.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
60.text: You cannot stay silent, child. Affirm your mandate.

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: My mind is my own, kith'rak. I will have your head!

107.text: *The gestures mean nothing to you - some sort of spell that you don't recognise.*

105.speaker: Narrator
105.text: *The gestures mean nothing to you - some sort of spell that you don't recognise.*

30.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
30.text: What is this? You travelled aboard the ghaik ship. You seek purification.

55.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
55.text: Why must the truth be so bitter, young one? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

85.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
85.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

91.speaker: Lae'zel
91.text: Enough games. You will die by my hand!

0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
0.text: Tsk'va! Baretha - split her skull. If she carries the weapon, see to its safety. I must fly to Vlaakith.

19.speaker: Lae'zel
19.text: Allow the esteemed kith'rak to continue.

12.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
12.text: ...name yourself, on command of our queen.
